body_html:
Tests failing on Linux are unrelated, while I'm getting a

RuntimeError: File length is not a multiple of the alignment size. Is this a valid PyTorch file?

on Windows. I'll need to investigate.

This is quite odd since the failing test is just test_file_format_serialization, while all the other roundtrip tests, which use both buffer and file, pass...

body:
Tests failing on Linux are unrelated, while I'm getting a
```
RuntimeError: File length is not a multiple of the alignment size. Is this a valid PyTorch file?
```
on Windows. I'll need to investigate.

This is quite odd since the failing test is just `test_file_format_serialization`, while all the other roundtrip tests, which use both buffer and file, pass...
